Illumination.Elite 1: Every point of Intellect and Will further grants ATK +0.10%.
Illumination.Elite 2: Every point of Intellect and Will further grants ATK +0.15%.

Subduer of Evil.Elite 2: Applying Knock Down also deals 50% ATK of Physical DMG.
Subduer of Evil.Elite 3: Applying Knock Down also deals 100% ATK of Physical DMG.

Youthful Ambition.Elite 1: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +12%
Youthful Ambition.Elite 3: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +16%

Laddie Reliable.Elite 2: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators a small Clue 3 Rate-UP: HAS (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
Laddie Reliable.Elite 4: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators Clue 3 Rate-UP: HAS (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
